summary: This module implements the loading infrastructure for Home Assistant, providing lazy, attribute‑based access to components, platforms and helper modules. It resolves custom and built‑in locations, handles dependencies, wraps modules to inject the core instance, and offers utilities to retrieve or register components.
business_intent: Allow the Home Assistant core to dynamically discover, import, and manage components, platforms and helper modules, supporting custom extensions and simplifying access for other parts of the system.
